objects.specification: The floor is covered with a contiguous light wood plank texture that has subtle grain variations and a smooth matte finish. It presents a warm natural appearance with pale brown and beige undertones, creating an inviting base for the classroom environment.
The walls are finished with a soft beige paint tone featuring a lightly textured matte surface. This gentle neutral shade creates a calm backdrop while subtly diffusing ambient light.
The walls are finished with a soft beige paint tone featuring a lightly textured matte surface. This gentle neutral shade creates a calm backdrop while subtly diffusing ambient light.

This teacher's desk features a robust solid medium-toned wood construction with a smooth polished finish. The rectangular desktop is supported by sturdy square wooden legs and has integrated modesty paneling at the front. The tabletop shows subtle rounded edges and a natural wood grain pattern that conveys classic classroom furniture style.

The whiteboard is a large rectangular panel with a glossy smooth white melamine surface, framed by a thin anodized aluminum border in a crisp silver color. The board has a flat recessed area behind the frame and appears seamless across the writing surface, ideal for clear marker presentations.

Each student desk has a modest rectangular desktop crafted from medium wood veneer with a soft matte finish. The desktop rests on slender metal legs in a neutral color, and the front apron of the desk includes a shallow storage shelf under the tabletop for personal items. The overall design is minimal, functional, and uniform.

Every student chair features a molded plastic seat and backrest colored in a complementary muted classroom tone, supported by a lightweight powder-coated metal frame. The seat has a slight contour for comfort and the backrest includes gentle curvature to support posture.

The bookshelf is a tall standing unit made from warm stained wood, comprised of multiple evenly spaced horizontal shelves. It is filled with an assortment of book spines and educational materials related to dinosaurs, giving a dense but orderly appearance. The sides and back panels are sturdy, with a smooth matte finish showing subtle wood grain details.

This exhibit is a life-size dinosaur skeleton model standing on a metal base. The bones are rendered in an off-white aged bone finish with realistic texture and articulation at the joints. The structure is detailed and anatomically accurate, evoking a museum-quality fossil display.

This exhibit is a life-size dinosaur skeleton model standing on a metal base. The bones are rendered in an off-white aged bone finish with realistic texture and articulation at the joints. The structure is detailed and anatomically accurate, evoking a museum-quality fossil display.

The poster is a thin rectangular panel with a glossy laminated print surface. It displays vibrant full-color dinosaur illustrations, charts, and labels. The edges are flush and the print quality is sharp and educational in style.

The window consists of a clear glass panel set within a simple painted frame in a neutral tone. The glass is smooth and transparent, showing a realistic window finish with subtle reflections.

The curtains are fabric panels in a light neutral shade with soft vertical pleats. They hang from an unseen rod and exhibit a gentle drape with natural folds, adding a warm decorative accent beside the window.

The globe is a spherical educational model mounted on a slim stand. The surface features detailed cartographic printing highlighting geological eras with color-coded landmasses and dinosaur habitats. The stand and meridian are painted in a muted dark metal finish.

Each potted plant consists of a lush cluster of green foliage emerging from a simple ceramic pot. The leaves are textured with subtle veins and natural variations in green tones. The pot has a smooth matte finish in a neutral color.

This ceiling light is a flush-mounted square fixture with a semi-translucent panel that diffuses LED illumination. The housing is a slim metal frame with a matte white finish, providing even overhead lighting.
